languages.text: "Неумирающий послал нас в ответ на молитвы монахов. Им должно блюсти обеты, нам — лить кровь еретиков. Замысел Его да будет исполнен".

traits.locale_text: "Неумирающий послал нас в ответ на молитвы монахов. Им должно блюсти обеты, нам — лить кровь еретиков. Замысел Его да будет исполнен".

languages.text: "The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий послал нас в ответ на молитвы монахов. Им должно блюсти обеты, нам — лить кровь еретиков. Замысел Его да будет исполнен".

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One sent us in response to the monks' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."
"The Undying One sent us in response to the monks' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."
"The Undying One sent us in response to the monks' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."
"The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."
"The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."
"The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."

languages.text: «El Inmortal nos envió en respuesta a las plegarias de los sacerdotes. Ellos deben preservar sus votos, y nosotros, derramar la sangre de los herejes. Cumplamos con Su designio».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."

languages.text: 「不死の者は、法師の祈りに応えるべく我らを送ったのです。彼らは誓いを守らねばならず、我らは異端者の血を流さねばならぬ。主の計画が実現しますよう」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."

languages.text: “不死之神派遣我们回应那些神甫的祈祷。他们必须恪守誓言，而我们必须让异端分子血流成河，来实现祂的愿景吧。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."

languages.text: "Der Todlose hat uns als Antwort auf die Gebete der Priester geschickt. Sie müssen ihr Gelübde erfüllen, während wir das Blut von Ketzern vergießen. Möge sich Sein Plan erfüllen."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."

languages.text: « L'Immortel nous a envoyés en réponse aux prières des prêtres. Ils doivent respecter leurs vœux. Quant à nous, nous devons verser le sang des hérétiques. Que Son dessein s'accomplisse. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."
"The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen, rahiplerin ettikleri dualara yanıt olarak bizi gönderdi. Ettikleri yeminlere ifa etmeliler. Biz de kâfirlerin kanını dökmeliyiz. O'nun tasarımı tamamına ersin."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One sent us in response to the priests' prayers. They must keep their vows, and we must shed the blood of heretics. Let His design be fulfilled."
